attributes.action: Return sacred items of Sikh heritage back to the Punjab.
attributes.background:
Such as the Throne of Maharaja Ranjit Singh.
Swords and other such artefacts that now sit in museums.
The Kalgi (plume) Of The 10th Sikh Guru.

During the British Raj many items were stolen as booty it is time that they were returend.

rejection.details: The repatriation of an item from a museum collection is a matter for the governing body of that museum, not the UK Government or Parliament.
